sentences.en: 'I am very much put out about my Ladybird.'
sentences.cn: “ 我为我那小鸟儿着急死了. ”

sentences.en: 'I don't suppose anything about it but what Ladybird tells me.'
sentences.cn: “除了 我 那小鸟儿告诉我的话之外,我不做任何假定. ”

sentences.en: A ladybird high in a tree said, Red's a lovely thing to be!
sentences.cn: 瓢虫高高地趴在树上说: “红色好可爱. ”

sentences.en: Actually, a ladybird is not a lady.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 瓢虫可不是一位女士.

sentences.en: And instead of a nice dish of minnows — they had a roasted grasshopper with ladybird sauce.
sentences.cn: 与一盘美味的小鲤鱼相反的,他们吃了一餐烤蚱蜢拌瓢虫酱.

sentences.en: Fly away ladybird, fly away home.
Ladybugs, also called ladybird beetles, eat aphids - small, soft insects that look like tiny grains of rice.
sentences.cn: 小甲虫, 也称为瓢虫, 食蚜小, 软昆虫,看起来像小粒大米.

sentences.en: Now, Ladybird, never you stir from that fire till I come back!
sentences.cn: 小鸟儿, 你可千万别离开壁炉,等我回来!

sentences.en: The ladybird is in the toilet.Ben is tired,He is on his bed.
sentences.cn: 这飘虫是在盥洗室。 本是疲累的，他在他的床上。

sentences.en: The ladybird is on his bed. Kitty is not afraid.
sentences.cn: 这飘虫是在她床上。基蒂是不害怕的。

sentences.en: These eggs turn into ladybird larvae, which are among the biggest friends we gardeners have. They're ferocious predators on problem whitefly and red spider mite.
sentences.cn: 这些卵变成幼瓢虫之后就是园丁们最好的朋友之一了，它们是凶猛的食肉动物，尤其针对粉虱与红蜘蛛。

sentences.en: They also protect their herds. On this scale , a ladybird is more dangerous than a wolf.
sentences.cn: 他们还会保护他们的牧群. 在这里, 瓢虫远远要比一只狼更加危险.

sentences.en: Your house is on fire, Mother Ladybird! Fly away home to your children!
sentences.cn: 你的家失火了, 七星瓢虫妈妈! 快点飞回家到你孩子身边去!

trans.tran_en: a small round beetle(= a type of insect ) that is usually red with black spots
